sentences.en: Critics say his paintings are worthless.
sentences.cn: 批评家说他的画毫无价值。

sentences.en: Deposits which were formerly considered worthless can now be extracted.
sentences.cn: 过去认为不值得开采的矿藏现在能够开采了.

sentences.en: He is worthless and unworthy, but it is largely my fault.
sentences.cn: 他固然是毫不足取,是个没出息的东西, 可是那主要应该怪我自己.

sentences.en: He was worthless as a painter.
I'd been brainwashed into believing I was worthless.
sentences.cn: 我被洗了脑，认为自己一文不值。

sentences.en: In their esteem, the bill was worthless.
sentences.cn: 在他们看来, 该议案毫无价值.

sentences.en: It contained so many errors as to render it worthless.
sentences.cn: 它错误太多，所以毫无用处。

sentences.en: Let out the secret and it is worthless.
sentences.cn: 戳破这窗户纸就一文不值.

sentences.en: She had been hoodwinked into buying a worthless necklace.
sentences.cn: 她受骗买了条一文不值的项链。

sentences.en: The car was a worthless wreck after the collision.
sentences.cn: 撞车以后,那辆车成了毫无价值的残骸.

sentences.en: The guarantee could be worthless if the firm goes out of business.
sentences.cn: 如果厂家倒闭，保修单就会变得毫无用处。

sentences.en: The house was full of worthless junk.
sentences.cn: 这房子里堆满了没有用的东西。

sentences.en: The information was worthless to me.
sentences.cn: 这些资料对我毫无用处。

sentences.en: Their proposals are all worthless and designed out of sinister motives.
sentences.cn: 他们的建议不仅一钱不值,而且包藏祸心.

sentences.en: This contract is worthless; you've been taken for a ride!
sentences.cn: 这份合同毫无价值, 你上当受骗了!

sentences.en: To go back to the point you have just mentioned is worthless.
sentences.cn: 再回头来谈论你的论点是毫无价值的.

sentences.en: You feel you really are completely worthless and unlovable.
sentences.cn: 你会觉得自己真是毫无价值，一点也不讨人喜欢。

words.tran_cn: 值得的；有价值的；配得上的，相称的；可尊敬的；应…的
无效的,无能的,琐碎的,无意义的,不值钱的

trans.tran_en: something that is worthless has no value, importance, or use
